mapper.select: /* etc.mng.err.cd.getList */ SELECT A.err_cd ,A.err_kor_nm ,A.err_eng_nm ,to_char(A.reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_dt ,to_char(A.updt_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') updt_dt ,A.reg_user_id ,A.updt_user_id ,USR.name reg_user_name FROM kcgbd.t_err_cd_mng A ,kcgbd.t_user USR WHERE 1=1 AND USR.user_id = A.reg_user_id

/* etc.mng.err.cd.getInfo */ SELECT A.err_cd ,A.err_kor_nm ,A.err_eng_nm ,to_char(A.reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_dt ,to_char(A.updt_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') updt_dt ,A.reg_user_id ,A.updt_user_id ,USR.name reg_user_name FROM kcgbd.t_err_cd_mng A ,kcgbd.t_user USR WHERE 1=1 AND USR.user_id = A.reg_user_id AND A.err_cd = #{err_cd}
/* etc.mng.err.cd.chkDpl */ SELECT count(A.err_cd) cnt FROM kcgbd.t_err_cd_mng A ,kcgbd.t_user USR WHERE 1=1 AND USR.user_id = A.reg_user_id AND err_cd = #{err_cd}
